Desc.entry: A self-help group open to everyone. Provides support and advice to those with tinnitus and their relatives to help them cope with day to day living. Can provide books about tinnitus, relaxation tapes, information leaflets and a newsletter. Arranges an annual Christmas lunch and a day trip in the Summer. A registered charity.

Pubs.entry: Sheffield Tinnitus Association newsletter; Leaflets; Helpful Hints booklets
